SEARCH
Package authenticationpkg

Class AuthStaff

java.lang.Object
authenticationpkg.AuthUser
authenticationpkg.AuthStaff
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AuthStaff extends AuthUser
AuthStaff represents the account type of Staff members. Inherits from AuthUser.
See Also:

      Constructor to instantiate AuthStaff with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of staff.
      userID - The userID of staff.
      password - The password associated with AuthStaff account type.
      faculty - The faculty that the staff belongs to.

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      public void createCamp(String campName, String startDate, String endDate, String registratonClosingDate, boolean openToNTU, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description)
      Creates a camp with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of camp.
      startDate - The start date of camp.
      endDate - The end date of camp.
      registratonClosingDate - The resgistration closing date of camp.
      openToNTU - If the camp is open to the entire university.
      location - The location where this camp is held.
      totalSlots - The total number of students that can register for this camp.
      campCommitteeSlots - The number of slots available for CCMembers.
      description - The description of this camp.

    • writeCampReport

      public void writeCampReport(String filtername, String ID, String filename)
      Writes and saves the camp report to be generated.
      Parameters:
      filtername - Name of the filter to be used.
      ID - The ID that the filter requires to write report; dependent on the type of filter. Possible IDs: campID, userID.
      filename - The file name that the report should be saved to.
